chokeWorstDownloader() - Method in class btClient.ChokeHandler
Finds the peer with the worst downloaded counter and chokes it, also resets the downloaded and uploaded counters for each peer

Finds the peer with the worst uploaded counter and chokes it, also resets the downloaded and uploaded counters for each peer

CommunicationTracker - Class in btClient
This class is tasked with handling communications with the torrent tracker, such as establishing a connection, finding peers, and alerting the tracker to the current state of the download
